summary: Detective Hazel Micallef hasn't had much to worry about in the sleepy town of Fort Dundas until a string of gruesome murders in the surrounding countryside brings her face to face with a serial killer driven by a higher calling.
cast: Susan Sarandon|Gil Bellows|Ellen Burstyn|Topher Grace|Donald Sutherland|Christopher Heyerdahl|Kevin Parent|Katy Breier|Paulino Nunes|Ted Whittall|Amanda Brugel|John Ralston|Natalie Radford|Alex Poch-Goldin|Ella Ballentine|Kristin Booth|Jane Johanson|Jane Moffat|Joan Massiah|Courtney Lyons|Shane Daly|Jonathan Watton|Darren Josephs|Sarah Orenstein|Janine Parkinson
title: La llamada
